name: Vanilla Bean Bourbon Milkshake
description: This Bobby Flay recipe makes one 16-ounce milkshake or two 8-ounce milkshakes.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 fresh vanilla bean, split and seeds scraped (reserve pod for another use)
11 ounces premium vanilla ice cream (about 1 3/4 packed cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the milk, bourbon, and vanilla bean seeds in the blender and blend until combined, about 5 seconds. Add the ice cream and blend until smooth, about 10 seconds.
